purpose: To provide a framework for automating web interactions, enabling tasks like testing, scraping, and web automation
principle: Leverages headless browser automation to simulate user interactions on web pages
reusability: Offers a modular API for scripting web interactions, supports integration with testing frameworks
limitations: Limited to browser-supported interactions, may require updates for compatibility with new web technologies
name: WebTwin
highlight: Simulates web browsing and interaction for automated testing and data extraction
